title: Democrat Eric Swalwell slams viral Trump cat and duck memes: 'What in the hell is this?'
content: Rep. Eric Swalwell's reaction to viral memes featuring Donald Trump with cats and ducks has gone viral. The memes originated from a debunked conspiracy theory alleging Haitian immigrants were abducting pets in Ohio. Swalwell criticized Republican House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan for promoting these unfounded claims on social media.
summary: Rep. Eric Swalwell's reaction to viral memes featuring Donald Trump with cats and ducks has gone viral. The memes originated from a debunked conspiracy theory alleging Haitian immigrants were abducting pets in Ohio. Swalwell criticized Republican House Judiciary Chairman Jim Jordan for promoting these unfounded claims on social media.

title: Trump vs Harris: Betting markets reveal who’s expected to win the US presidential debate
content: Anticipation for the first presidential debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris is high, with betting markets favoring Harris to win the debate. However, Trump remains favored to win the overall election. Experts suggest debates may not drastically sway election outcomes unless they are particularly one-sided, highlighting an interesting dynamic in this political contest.
summary: Anticipation for the first presidential debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris is high, with betting markets favoring Harris to win the debate. However, Trump remains favored to win the overall election. Experts suggest debates may not drastically sway election outcomes unless they are particularly one-sided, highlighting an interesting dynamic in this political contest.

title: Imran’s flock detained after protest for his release
Kamala Harris' throwback video with Willie Brown viral: 'Are you his daughter?'
content: The viral footage was from 1995 where the subject was Willie Brown described as a man "notorious for his flamboyant lifestyle, flashy clothes, fancy parties and fine women and fast cars". Kamala Harris was seen in the video replying "No, I am not" to one asking "Are you his daughter?"
summary: The viral footage was from 1995 where the subject was Willie Brown described as a man "notorious for his flamboyant lifestyle, flashy clothes, fancy parties and fine women and fast cars". Kamala Harris was seen in the video replying "No, I am not" to one asking "Are you his daughter?"

title: When dean of Barron Trump's new school called Donald 'threat'
content: Barron Trump, son of former President Donald Trump, has enrolled at NYU's Stern School of Business. Interim dean JP Eggers, who once criticized Trump's presidency in a 2020 letter, met Barron on his first day. Barron's choice of university was widely speculated and he ultimately chose NYU for its proximity to their Manhattan home and also because he liked the college.
summary: Barron Trump, son of former President Donald Trump, has enrolled at NYU's Stern School of Business. Interim dean JP Eggers, who once criticized Trump's presidency in a 2020 letter, met Barron on his first day. Barron's choice of university was widely speculated and he ultimately chose NYU for its proximity to their Manhattan home and also because he liked the college.

title: Have Donald Trump and Kamala Harris ever met? 'I have a photo of her...'
content: Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend Willie Brown claimed to have introduced (not face to face) Kamala Harris to then businessman Donald Trump. Brown, Harris and a few other associates had been in Cambridge, Massachusetts, where Brown was speaking at Harvard, when Trump sent up his plane to ferry the group to Teterboro, New Jersey. Trump urgently wanted Brown’s advice on how to build a property in Los Angeles​.
summary: Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend Willie Brown claimed to have introduced (not face to face) Kamala Harris to then businessman Donald Trump. Brown, Harris and a few other associates had been in Cambridge, Massachusetts, where Brown was speaking at Harvard, when Trump sent up his plane to ferry the group to Teterboro, New Jersey. Trump urgently wanted Brown’s advice on how to build a property in Los Angeles​.

title: Two Delta planes collide at Atlanta airport, wing knocks off tail
content: Two Delta planes collided while they were taxiing at Atlanta International Airport on Tuesday leading to no injuries. The wing of one plane knocked off the tail of the other and the passengers were accommodated on alternative flights. The Federal Aviation Administration said Delta Flight 295's wingtip struck the tail of Endeavor Air Flight 5526.
summary: Two Delta planes collided while they were taxiing at Atlanta International Airport on Tuesday leading to no injuries. The wing of one plane knocked off the tail of the other and the passengers were accommodated on alternative flights. The Federal Aviation Administration said Delta Flight 295's wingtip struck the tail of Endeavor Air Flight 5526.

title: UK says started 'termination of all direct air services' to Iran
content: The UK said Tuesday it has started terminating "all direct air services between the UK and Iran" as part of new sanctions on Tehran for supplying Russia with missiles to use in Ukraine. "(This) is why we have begun the termination of all direct air services between the UK and Iran."
summary: The UK said Tuesday it has started terminating "all direct air services between the UK and Iran" as part of new sanctions on Tehran for supplying Russia with missiles to use in Ukraine. "(This) is why we have begun the termination of all direct air services between the UK and Iran."

title: Last-minute changes in Kamala Harris' debate script: What happened at Pittsburgh hotel
content: ​Kamala Harris camped at a Pittsburgh hotel for five days preparing for the debate tonight in which she will face Donald Trump for the first time for the presidential duel. Inside the hotel, reports said, there were highly choreographed debate practice sessions including a stage, a replica TV lighting, and Philippe Reines acting as Donald Trump in mock debates.
summary: ​Kamala Harris camped at a Pittsburgh hotel for five days preparing for the debate tonight in which she will face Donald Trump for the first time for the presidential duel. Inside the hotel, reports said, there were highly choreographed debate practice sessions including a stage, a replica TV lighting, and Philippe Reines acting as Donald Trump in mock debates.

title: China refuses to sign agreement to ban AI from controlling nuclear weapons
content: China opted out of the 'Blueprint for Action' agreement aimed at banning AI from controlling nuclear weapons. The non-binding agreement was adopted at the REAIM summit in Seoul with over 100 countries present. It stresses human control over nuclear actions and acknowledges the need for further discussions on military AI policies. Russia was excluded due to its Ukraine invasion.
summary: China opted out of the 'Blueprint for Action' agreement aimed at banning AI from controlling nuclear weapons. The non-binding agreement was adopted at the REAIM summit in Seoul with over 100 countries present. It stresses human control over nuclear actions and acknowledges the need for further discussions on military AI policies. Russia was excluded due to its Ukraine invasion.

title: JD Vance was 'caught' spreading rumors about Haitian immigrants. He doesn't care
content: A day after JD Vance was caught furthering a racist conspiracy theory that Haitian immigrants settled in Ohio's Springfield are eating pet cats and ducks, Vance said his office received many calls from Springfield residents who complained that the pets of their neighbors were stolen by Haitian migrants. Vance said even if these are rumors and may turn out to be false, the migrant problem in Ohio is real.
summary: A day after JD Vance was caught furthering a racist conspiracy theory that Haitian immigrants settled in Ohio's Springfield are eating pet cats and ducks, Vance said his office received many calls from Springfield residents who complained that the pets of their neighbors were stolen by Haitian migrants. Vance said even if these are rumors and may turn out to be false, the migrant problem in Ohio is real.

title: Melania Trump drops strategic video ahead of debate: 'Attempt to end my husband's life...'
content: Melania Trump released a video seeking answers for the assassination attempt on Donald Trump. Though it was a promotion for her upcoming memoir, the video came hours before the ABC News debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Melania has been promoting her memoir -- to be released on October 8 -- on her social media accounts. The memoir is about her but the promotional material she chose so far are all about her husband Donald Trump.
summary: Melania Trump released a video seeking answers for the assassination attempt on Donald Trump. Though it was a promotion for her upcoming memoir, the video came hours before the ABC News debate between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris. Melania has been promoting her memoir -- to be released on October 8 -- on her social media accounts. The memoir is about her but the promotional material she chose so far are all about her husband Donald Trump.

title: 'Demented': Donald Trump facing questions about age, capacity in debate with Harris
content: As Donald Trump and Kamala Harris take to the ABC News debate stage tonight, it will be 78-year-old Donald Trump facing the question of age and senility against Kamala Harris -- 20 years younger than him. Donald Trump's recent statement on childcare that 'childcare is childcare' raised questions over his rambling though Trump campaign asserted that Trump has more energy and stamina than anyone in politics.
summary: As Donald Trump and Kamala Harris take to the ABC News debate stage tonight, it will be 78-year-old Donald Trump facing the question of age and senility against Kamala Harris -- 20 years younger than him. Donald Trump's recent statement on childcare that 'childcare is childcare' raised questions over his rambling though Trump campaign asserted that Trump has more energy and stamina than anyone in politics.

title: Tulsi Gabbard says Kamala Harris is taking extreme acting lessons: 'She's talented on debate stage but...'
content: ​Tulsi Gabbard said being a good debater does not make anyone the most-preferred presidential candidate but mainstream media projects it that way and hence Kamala Harris is taking "extreme acting lessons" with Hollywood advisers, Hollywood lights hoping that she would be declared the winner of tonight's debate and that would "trick" people into actually voting for her.
summary: ​Tulsi Gabbard said being a good debater does not make anyone the most-preferred presidential candidate but mainstream media projects it that way and hence Kamala Harris is taking "extreme acting lessons" with Hollywood advisers, Hollywood lights hoping that she would be declared the winner of tonight's debate and that would "trick" people into actually voting for her.

title: ‘We don't employ your children’: Controversial company memo on sick leave for children sparks outrage
content: A company memo stating that employees can no longer take leave to care for sick children has ignited widespread criticism. Shared on Reddit, the memo argues that family responsibilities should not affect work attendance. This stance has been condemned by many as a setback in the struggle for improved work-life balance and employee rights.
summary: A company memo stating that employees can no longer take leave to care for sick children has ignited widespread criticism. Shared on Reddit, the memo argues that family responsibilities should not affect work attendance. This stance has been condemned by many as a setback in the struggle for improved work-life balance and employee rights.

title: SpaceX launches all-civilian crew for first private spacewalk
content: SpaceX's Polaris Dawn mission launched successfully after several weather delays, sending a four-person civilian crew into Earth's Van Allen radiation belts. Led by billionaire Jared Isaacman, this mission includes the first commercial spacewalk and aims to surpass NASA’s Gemini 11 mission’s highest Earth orbit record. The Falcon 9 rocket lifted off from Nasa's Kennedy Space Center.
summary: SpaceX's Polaris Dawn mission launched successfully after several weather delays, sending a four-person civilian crew into Earth's Van Allen radiation belts. Led by billionaire Jared Isaacman, this mission includes the first commercial spacewalk and aims to surpass NASA’s Gemini 11 mission’s highest Earth orbit record. The Falcon 9 rocket lifted off from Nasa's Kennedy Space Center.

title: Meghan Markle’s autobiography could be a ‘gold mine,’ says royal expert
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle might capitalize on their strained relationship with the British monarchy through Meghan’s potential autobiography. Royal expert Tom Bower suggests this book could significantly boost their income. The couple is reportedly waiting before openly discussing their royal experiences, aiming to maintain public interest and avoid immediate backlash.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle might capitalize on their strained relationship with the British monarchy through Meghan’s potential autobiography. Royal expert Tom Bower suggests this book could significantly boost their income. The couple is reportedly waiting before openly discussing their royal experiences, aiming to maintain public interest and avoid immediate backlash.

title: Donald Trump claims Mark Zuckerberg won't back Kamala Harris; Meta refutes allegations
content: Donald Trump alleged that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told him he wouldn't vote for a Democrat in the upcoming election, which Meta denies, asserting Zuckerberg's neutrality. This follows Zuckerberg's praise of Trump's response to a shooting incident and his admission of yielding to Biden-Harris administration pressure on Covid-19 content in 2021.
summary: Donald Trump alleged that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg told him he wouldn't vote for a Democrat in the upcoming election, which Meta denies, asserting Zuckerberg's neutrality. This follows Zuckerberg's praise of Trump's response to a shooting incident and his admission of yielding to Biden-Harris administration pressure on Covid-19 content in 2021.

title: 'Women are literally not safe anywhere': Serbian rights activist exposes dark side of Telegram groups
content: Serbian rights activist Stasa Ivkovic revealed that Telegram groups are sharing illicit sexual content like revenge porn and child pornography. Ivkovic infiltrated these groups, exposing the exchange of intimate photos and personal details. Despite this alarming trend, Serbian authorities have shut down only 13 such groups, leading to calls for stronger legal measures.
summary: Serbian rights activist Stasa Ivkovic revealed that Telegram groups are sharing illicit sexual content like revenge porn and child pornography. Ivkovic infiltrated these groups, exposing the exchange of intimate photos and personal details. Despite this alarming trend, Serbian authorities have shut down only 13 such groups, leading to calls for stronger legal measures.

title: Dubai princess launches new perfume, weeks after divorcing her husband. Guess its name
content: Princess Shaikha Mahra of Dubai has launched a new perfume line named 'Divorce' following her recent separation from Sheikh Mana Bin Mohammed. She announced the launch on Instagram, revealing a sleek black bottle. Earlier, in July, she announced her public split up on Instagram. The princess is an advocate for women's empowerment and supports local designers in the UAE.
summary: Princess Shaikha Mahra of Dubai has launched a new perfume line named 'Divorce' following her recent separation from Sheikh Mana Bin Mohammed. She announced the launch on Instagram, revealing a sleek black bottle. Earlier, in July, she announced her public split up on Instagram. The princess is an advocate for women's empowerment and supports local designers in the UAE.
